entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS @SpeakerPelosi @senatemajldr When you, Trump, face CoronaVirus, intentionally unprepared despite forewarning, it is disingenuous to assign your failure elsewhere. The World holds Trump responsible for an exacerbated poor outcome in America.
